verbs.description: < p > A new federal policy [V: will] allow federal agents to investigate , and possibly arrest and deport , families who step up to host children found at the border . It 's the latest in a series of enforcement actions by the Trump administration intended to discourage a new surge in unauthorized immigrants.</p >

It 's the latest in a series of enforcement actions by the Trump administration intended to discourage a new surge in unauthorized immigrants.</p >
